headline.print_headline: 2 Blintzes Only, And a Toast To Your Health
headline.main: 2 Blintzes Only, and a Toast to Your Health

docs.lead_paragraph: The Bloomberg administration is determined to make New Yorkers healthier, whether or not it’s what they want.
